education.title: Engineering
education.description: Specialized in artificial intelligence and machine learning with focus on natural language processing. Thesis on 'Deep Learning Approaches for Contextual Understanding in Conversational AI'.

education.title: Computer Science
education.description: Focused on algorithms and computational theory. Graduated with honors and received the Outstanding Graduate Student Award.

education.title: Computer Engineering
education.description: Double major in Mathematics. Senior project on distributed systems. Dean's List all semesters.

experience.title: Advanced AI Solutions Team
experience.description: Leading a team of 8 researchers working on next-generation language models. Developed key components of the latest conversational AI system deployed across Google products.

experience.title: Natural Language Understanding
experience.description: Contributed to GPT architecture improvements. Focused on enhancing contextual understanding and reducing hallucinations in large language models.

experience.title: AI Research Division
experience.description: Worked on machine learning models for code completion and generation. Published 2 papers at top-tier conferences based on this work.

research.title: Multimodal Learning for Robotics
research.description: Developed novel approaches for robots to learn from both visual and textual instructions. Resulted in 3 publications and a patent application.

research.title: Efficient Transformers
research.description: Investigated methods to reduce computational requirements of transformer models while maintaining performance. Achieved 40% reduction in training time.

research.title: Explainable AI Systems
research.description: Researched techniques to make deep learning models more interpretable. Work cited in over 50 subsequent papers in the field.
